ðŸ“– Summary: The FreeGamesApp is a cross-platform application designed to help users discover time-limited free game offers and DLC. It provides instant access to promotions from various platforms through a custom API, offering a clean and minimal interface focused solely on free games and DLC. The application is available for Windows and Android and is an open-source project.
